addressSuggestion.addressVerificationUnableDescription: We were unable to verify your address with the postal database. Using the address you entered may cause delays receiving your order.

errorMsg._ERR_UPDATE_CARD_FAIL: Unable to add credit card to profile. Please try again.
errorMsg._RTS_GC_INACTIVE: This gift card is currently inactive. Please contact Customer Care Live Chat or 1-888-922-2336 for further assistance.
errorMsg._ERR_DEFAULT_KEY: Unable to process your request at this time. Please try again.
errorMsg._DUPLICATE_GC_CARD: Gift Card already exists in profile.
errorMsg._STORE_ONLY_GIFT_CARD: Your merchandise credit gift card can only be used in stores. Please use another form of payment method.
errorMsg.merchandiseCreditCard: The number you entered is an in-store merchandise credit. Please visit your local store to redeem.
errorMsg._ERR_GET_CARD_FAIL: Unable to load your saved payment information. Please try again later.
errorMsg.invalidCVVLength: Please enter a valid security code
errorMsg.outOfStock: This item is out of stock. Please add it to your wishlist or remove it from your cart to proceed.
errorMsg._ERR_ADD_CARD_FAIL: Unable to add credit card to profile. Please try again.
